goal: Create a new StaynB wishlist called 'Canadian Rockies Trip'. Then, search for places in Canmore, Alberta, and add the 'Three Sisters Peak View' property to this new list. Finally, share the entire wishlist with my friend Leo at leo.g@workplace.net.

evals.description: Verify that a wishlist named 'Canadian Rockies Trip' was created and contains the 'Three Sisters Peak View' property.
evals.query: staynb.wishlists[?name=='Canadian Rockies Trip'].properties[?name=='Three Sisters Peak View'] | length(@)
